scripts.start: cd src && conda run --no-capture-output -n vizdom python -u ./app.py
scripts.pipeline: cd src && conda run --no-capture-output -n vizdom python -u ./pipeline.py
scripts.freeze: conda env export > environment.yml && pip3 freeze > requirements.txt
scripts.setup: conda env create -f ./environment.yml && pip3 install -r requirements.txt
